directions: Add the sauce to the pan and mix throughly to combine and heat the sauce. I had to add a few TBSP of water to thin the sauce out, even with the oil from the pan.
Spoon that into lettuce cups. I used iceberg since it was on sale but romaine boats would probably be easier to eat. Garnish with some sesame seeds if you're feeling cheeky.
ingredients: Saut√© all of the above together. It will smell insanely delicious. While that's going, prep the sauce.
3 TBSP Almond Butter (chunky baby!) ALMOND MEAL
3 TBSP Gluten Free tamari MOUNTAIN SAUCE
1 TBSP grated ginger 20-30 drops of liquid stevia (Sweet Drops) SPLENDA
Add the sauce to the pan and mix throughly to combine and heat the sauce. I had to add a few TBSP of water to thin the sauce out, even with the oil from the pan.
Spoon that into lettuce cups. I used iceberg since it was on sale but romaine boats would probably be easier to eat. Garnish ith some sesame seeds if you're feeling cheeky.
I added it to MFP. I hope other people can search for my recipe...
title: Pork Lettuce Wraps
